rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2112, 2119, 2124, 2479, 3779}

description: A series of lectures covers the following topics: professional associations, folio preparation, fees and commissions, gallery management, the function and roles of public, private and artist run galleries, catalogue publication, curating, conservation, art criticism and intellectual property, copyright and taxation, promotion, publicity and press releases in addition to the documentation of work. Tutorials explore these options through practical exercises and case studies.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
